item.title: [j22] Aftershock
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.

item.title: [j22] Aether Spellbomb
item.description:
Artifact

{U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

{1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Aethershield Artificer
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Artificer

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

item.title: [j22] Aeronaut Tinkerer
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Aeronaut Tinkerer has flying as long as you control an artifact. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

item.title: [j22] Aerial Modification
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature or Vehicle

As long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types.

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

item.title: [j22] Adventurous Impulse
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [j22] Adventuring Gear
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [j22] Act on Impulse
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way. (If you cast a spell this way, you still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

item.title: [j22] Acrobatic Maneuver
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Academy Journeymage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard.

When Academy Journeymage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

item.title: [j22] Agrus Kos, Eternal Soldier
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Soldier

Vigilance

Whenever Agrus Kos, Eternal Soldier becomes the target of an ability that targets only it, you may pay {1}{R/W}. If you do, copy that ability for each other creature you control that ability could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures. ({R/W} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.)

item.title: [j22] Angelic Cub
item.description:
Creature — Cat Angel

Whenever Angelic Cub becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

As long as Angelic Cub has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it has flying.

item.title: [j22] Chains of Custody
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature you control

When Chains of Custody enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Chains of Custody leaves the battlefield.

Enchanted creature has ward {2}. Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

item.title: [j22] Alandra, Sky Dreamer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Merfolk Wizard

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

Whenever you draw your fifth card each turn, Alandra, Sky Dreamer and Drakes you control each get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

item.title: [j22] Biblioplex Kraken
item.description:
Creature — Kraken

When Biblioplex Kraken enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

Whenever Biblioplex Kraken attacks, you may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Biblioplex Kraken can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [j22] Kenesos, Priest of THassa
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Merfolk Cleric

If you would scry a number of cards, scry that many cards plus one instead.

{3}{G/U}: Look at the top card of yhour library. If it's a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent creature card, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

item.title: [j22] Launch Mishap
item.description:
Instant

Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

item.title: [j22] Deadly Plot
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

• Return target Zombie creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [j22] Ossuary Rats
item.description:
Creature — Rat

When Ossuary Rats enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [j22] Skullslither Worm
item.description:
Creature — Worm

When Skullslither Worm enters the battelfield, each opponent discards a card. For each opponent who can't, put two +1/+1 counters on Skullslither Worm.

item.title: [j22] Suspicious Shambler
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

{4}{B}{B}, Exile Suspicious Shambler from your graveyard: Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [j22] Auntie Blyte, Bad Influence
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Devil Advisor

Flying

Whenever a source you control deals damage to you, put that many +1/+1 counters on Auntie Blyte, Bad Influence.

{1}{R}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Auntie Blyte: It deals X damage to any target.

item.title: [j22] Brazen Cannonade
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an attacking creature you control dies, Brazen Cannonade deals 2 damage to each opponent.

Raid — At the beginning of your precombat main phase, if you attacked with a creature this turn, exile the top card of your library. Until end of combat on your next turn, you may play that card.

item.title: [j22] Coalborn Entity
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

{2}{R}: Coalborn Entity deals 1 damage to target creature token, player, or planeswalker.

item.title: [j22] Daring Piracy
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with menace and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [j22] Goblin Researcher
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Wizard

When Goblin Researcher enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with Goblin Researcher, you may play that card.

item.title: [j22] Mizzix, Replica Rider
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Wizard

Flying

Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may pay {1}{U/R}. If you do, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy. If the copy is a permanent spell, it gains haste and "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent." (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

item.title: [j22] Ogre Battlecaster
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Shaman

First strike

Whenever Ogre Battlecaster attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard by paying {R}{R} in addition to its other costs. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. When you cast that spell, Ogre Battlecaster gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.

item.title: [j22] Plundering Predator
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Plundering Predator enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Benevolent Hydra
item.description:
Creature — Hydra

Benevolent Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on another creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 countersa re put on it instead.

{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Benevolent Hydra: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

item.title: [j22] Giant Ladybug
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Reach

When Giant Ladybug enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

item.title: [j22] Rampaging Growth
item.description:
Instant

Search your library for a basic land card, put it on the battlefield, then shuffle. Until end of turn, that land becomes a 4/3 Insect creature with reach and haste. It's still a land.

item.title: [j22] Zask, Skittering Swarmlord
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Insect

You may play lands and cast Insect spells from your graveyard.

Whenever another Insect you control dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library, then mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

{1}{B/G}: Target Insect gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. ({B/G can be paid with either {B} or {G}.)

item.title: [j22] Merrow Reejerey
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Soldier

Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.

item.title: [slc] Lotus Field
item.description:
Land

Hexproof

Lotus Field enters the battlefield tapped.

When Lotus Field enters the battlefield, sacrifice two lands.

{T}: Add three mana of any one color.

item.title: [j22] Planar Atlas
item.description:
Artifact

Planar Atlas enters the battlefield tapped.

When Planar Atlas enters the battlefield, you may look at the top four cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [j22] Merfolk Pupil
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Wizard

When Merfolk Pupil enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

{1}{U}, Exile Merfolk Pupil from your graveyard: Draw a card, then discard a card.

item.title: [j22] Whirler Rogue
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue Artificer

When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [j22] Arlinn, Voice of the Pack
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Arlinn

Each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

−2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

item.title: [j22] Mild-Mannered Librarian
item.description:
Creature — Human

{3}{G}: Mild-Mannered Librarian becomes a werewolf. Put two +1/+1 counters on it and you draw a card. Activate only once.

item.title: [j22] Wicked Wolf
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

When Wicked Wolf enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.

Sacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on Wicked Wolf. It gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

item.title: [j22] Spectral Hunt-Caller
item.description:
Creature — Wolf Spirit

{5}{G}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Thrashing Brontodon
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur

{1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [j22] Runadi, Behemoth Caller
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Cat Shaman

Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 5 or greater, that creature enters the battlefield with X additional +1/+1 counters on it, where X is its mana value minus 4.

Creature you control with three or more +1/+1 counters on them have haste.

{T}: Add {G}.

item.title: [j22] Rodolf Duskbringer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Angel

Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

Whenever you gain life, Rodolf Duskbringer gains indestructible until end of turn.

At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {1}{W/B}. When you do, return target creature with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

item.title: [j22] Feast of Blood
item.description:
Sorcery

Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires.

Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.

item.title: [j22] Oathsworn Vampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Knight

Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped.

You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.

item.title: [j22] Blood Artist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [j22] Creeping Bloodsucker
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

At the beginning of your upkeep, Creeping Bloodsucker deals 1 damage to each opponent. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

item.title: [j22] Primeval Herald
item.description:
Creature — Elf Scout

Trample

Whenever Primeval Herald enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
